title: If I get gold during preseason, what does that mean for ranked next season?
body: 1 more win till silver 2, went from silver 5 to silver 2 past two weeks :)

replies.body:
it means nothing. its just your MMR should be going up. but you can get MMR gains without going up divisions.
eventually you would jump if staying in the same div and winning enough for MMR gains, but overall its about the MMR.

has a little effect on your placement matches next season. There is a soft reset of MMR which basically "normalises" your MMR so your pre-season gains don't count for as much as it would if it happened during the season. It still counts for something, just not as much as you'd expect.

Preseason is for practice with the changes and in general. not for climbing.

haha! 

So have i! Yea all it does is raise your MMR strength so that the system classifies you as a higher elo player in its algorithm when it matches you in placements and obviously that with other factors (last seasons placements, who you play with, wins/losses, etc) determines placements next season. 

Good luck next season :P
raises mmr doesnt it, so like you get with higher elo people in ur placement games
